quote-source: Phoenix rises thanks to Herzog, The Guardian, February 3, 2006.
quote-text: "There was this German voice saying ‘Just relax’," the 31-year-old actor [Joaquin Phoenix] recalled, adding that Herzog then helped him from the vehicle. "There’s something so calming and beautiful about Werner Herzog’s voice," Phoenix said. "I felt completely fine and safe." Herzog has a home near where the accident occurred.
